title: Drawing, "Sideboard", ca. 1929–30
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower left: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right: SCALE 1"=1'0"/7658 [circled]; lower right in red color pencil: P; dimensions in graphite
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for sideboard. Top in Bakelite or dark wood, body in lighter wood. Two narrow drawers below top of table on left and right side; two cabinets below drawers with vertical pulls at center. Side supports with rounded front edges. Base in darker wood or other material.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sideboard", ca. 1929–30.
ca. 1929–30. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-924.
